title: Xayah/Rakan Trade
body:
Hey I want to trade. I have only 6500 IP so the only way I can get Xayah is if someone trades her to me and I trade you a champion back. It would be cool if the one could trade me first because of the low IP if I get betrayed I don't have any IP left. :/ But I will definitly trade back here's a Screenshot of my account so you can see the IP and report me if I'm lying:

http://i.imgur.com/6ygB69L.jpg

EUW: Snowmelody

replies.body:
Hey,
if u did not found some one jet, 
then write me pls Ingame  (z0cker63)
I wanna have Rakan.
I didnot got enough IP right now (i got 4400), but i tryin to get 6300 IP as fast as i can, i think that i will have the 6300 IP on sunday Or Monday.
So if u are interestet pls write me ingame
Hab gerade gesehen das du auch deutsch bist XD, also wie gesagt schreib mir bei Interesse einfach Ingame  (z0cker63)
